subject: Off Topic: Spring Testing
msgSnippet: Hi there, slightly off topic: Does anyone here know, whether I can convince Springs test support to reuse a single container for multiple JUnit test classes? I
messageBody:
Hi there,

slightly off topic: Does anyone here know, whether I can convince
Springs test support to reuse a single container for multiple JUnit
test classes?
I use the SpringJUnit4ClassRunner at them moment.

Greetings,
Malte
